content.description: The polynomial function <math alttext="k"><semantics><mi>k</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is given by <math alttext="k open parentheses x close parentheses equals a x to the power of 4 minus b x cubed plus 15"><semantics><mrow><mi>k</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mi>a</mi><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>4</mn></msup><mo>-</mo><mi>b</mi><msup><mi>x</mi><mn>3</mn></msup><mo>+</mo><mn>15</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>, where <math alttext="a"><semantics><mi>a</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> and <math alttext="b"><semantics><mi>b</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> are nonzero real constants. Each of the zeros of <math alttext="k"> <semantics> <mi>k</mi> <annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation> </semantics> </math> has multiplicity <math alttext="1"><semantics><mn>1</mn><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. In the <math alttext="x y"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mi>y</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>-plane, an <math alttext="x"><semantics><mi>x</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>-intercept of the graph of <math alttext="k"><semantics><mi>k</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is <math alttext="open parentheses 17.997 , 0 close parentheses"><semantics><mfenced><mn>17.997,0</mn></mfenced><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>. A zero of <math alttext="k"><semantics><mi>k</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is <math alttext="negative 0.478 minus 0.801 i"><semantics><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>0.478</mn><mo>-</mo><mn>0.801</mn><mi>i</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>.
content.question: Which of the following statements must be true?

choices.label: ​<math alttext="negative 0.478 plus 0.801 i"><semantics><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>0.478</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>0.801</mn><mi>i</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is a zero of <math alttext="k"><semantics><mi>k</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>.

​The equation <math alttext="k open parentheses x close parentheses equals 0"><semantics><mrow><mi>k</mi><mfenced><mi>x</mi></mfenced><mo>=</mo><mn>0</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> has four real solutions.

​The graph of <math alttext="k"><semantics><mi>k</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is tangent to the <math alttext="x"><semantics><mi>x</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>-axis at <math alttext="x equals 17.997"><semantics><mrow><mi>x</mi><mo>=</mo><mn>17.997</mn></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>.

content.answer: ​<math alttext="negative 0.478 plus 0.801 i"><semantics><mrow><mo>-</mo><mn>0.478</mn><mo>+</mo><mn>0.801</mn><mi>i</mi></mrow><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math> is a zero of <math alttext="k"><semantics><mi>k</mi><annotation encoding="application/vnd.wiris.mtweb-params+json">{"digitSeparatorsAsMN":"auto"}</annotation></semantics></math>.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Describe the characteristics of a function with varying levels of precision, depending on the function representation and available mathematical tools.
